name: Mouse.
description:
A rage game where you use your mouse to dodge a LOT of bullets from different bosses. Space to use activated skills. To get an S rank, you need to find a black dot on a level, click it, and then beat the boss without taking a hit. To get a P rank, you have to figure it out! Heavily based on Studio MDHR's Cuphead. The game will take a little while longer than usual after an update. Remember to equip skills!

If project does not load you can play here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/716099649/

My ranks on all the bosses:

Charlie Choco: B

Dirty Dennis: S and P (he is the easiest boss in my opinion)

Slimey Sam: NA (Have not beaten him)

Shadow Creature: A (P is not possible here)

Rank Possibilities:

S!!!

A!

B

C

D

E

F

P- pacifist

Reviews:

"The most innovative rage game I've played in years" - Superhot Game Reviews

"A beautiful mix of difficulty and more difficulty in any game I've ever seen" - Real Game Reviewer

"Very hip, very cool" - Unnamed Review Site

"The only game you should ever play. It is SO much better then any other game on the market. Best of all, it's free!" - IBitACow, definitely NOT the creator of the game
